name: Plants vs. Zombies: Game of the Year Edition
description: You have to install Plant vs. Zombies game in origin game library manually, the script only setup the enviroment for you to download and install the game. It only have minimum configuration, so no promise to run any game other than PvZ from origin store.
notes:
nocrashdialog d3dcompiler_43 d3dx9 in winetricks
basicly a rip-off from the-sims-4-origin-d9vk script without d9vk stuff

task.description: Installing Origin... Login window will pop-up and close.
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- updater: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DrDoctor13/wine-origin-updater/master/updateorigin.sh
- origin: https://origin-a.akamaihd.net/Origin-Client-Download/origin/live/OriginThinSetup.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Origin/Origin.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine Prefix...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: nocrashdialog d3dcompiler_43 d3dx9
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    description: Installing Origin... Login window will pop-up and close.
    exclude_processes: Origin.exe OriginClientService.exe OriginWebHelperService.exe
      QtWebEngineProcess.exe
    executable: origin
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Spoofing AMD RX 550...
    key: VideoPciVendorID
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: 1002
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Spoofing AMD RX 550...
    key: VideoPciDeviceID
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: 699f
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- chmodx: updater
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Origin
    src: updater
